title: Perfect chicken stock
ingredients: ['3.6kg chicken bones', '3.75 litres cold water, to cover', '120g sliced celery (2.5cm pieces)', '130g sliced carrot (1.25cm pieces)', '1 (225g) onion, quartered', '6 parsley stems', '2 sprigs fresh thyme', '1 bay leaf', '10 whole black peppercorns', '1 clove garlic (optional)', 'cheesecloth', 'kitchen twine', 'salt to taste']
